Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: houseguest \houseguest\, house guest \house guest\n. a guest entertained and staying overnight in one's house for one or more nights. [WordNet 1.5 +PJC]

Definition.WordDefinition: houseguest \houseguest\, house guest \house guest\n. a guest entertained and staying overnight in one's house for one or more nights. [WordNet 1.5 +PJC]
house guest n : a guest entertained in your house [syn: {houseguest}]
houseguest n : a guest entertained in your house [syn: {house guest}]
